mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_user WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} and USER_PW = #{user_pw}

SELECT sm.study_cd, s.study_title, s.study_content, s.closed_at, s.study_limit, COUNT(sm2.member_cd) AS current_members FROM tb_study_member sm JOIN tb_study s ON sm.study_cd = s.study_cd LEFT JOIN tb_study_member sm2 ON s.study_cd = sm2.study_cd AND sm2.status = 'JOINED' WHERE sm.user_id = #{user_id} AND sm.status = 'JOINED' GROUP BY sm.study_cd, s.study_title, s.study_content, s.closed_at, s.study_limit
